title: Charleston police: Mother shot and wounded son, killed herself
content:
CHARLESTON, S.C. (WCIV) — Charleston police say a mother shot and wounded her 3-year-old son before killing herself.
Police responded to a report of a suicide at a Lyttleton Avenue home at around 5 p.m. Monday.
Officers found one woman dead from a gunshot wound and her son, identified as Edward Hays Reynolds V, also suffering from a gunshot wound to his torso.
The coroner confirmed the woman shot herself, and she has since been identified as Lauren Peele Reynolds.
There has been little information released on the child's condition.
According to an obituary, the woman's husband passed away earlier this year. The coroner confirmed he died of a brain bleed/aneurysm.
If anyone knows anything about this or any other crime, they are asked to call Crime Stoppers at 554-1111.
We will update this story when more information becomes available.
